item.title: Ok...i need help...again
item.dc:creator: @mkdj mkdj
item.description:
@mkdj wrote:

ok my level stats thing in my player files is this:
}
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > 50000000)
return 150;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 150; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 0;
}

i have compiled successfully but still cant get it to work in the game…help :S [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2008, 06:54:58 PM[/size][hr]nm…i didnt add it in client…what a noob
